name: Square Attack (gazlebowski)
description:
Hello there,

Welcome to the game page of "Square Attack", my take on the quasi-strategy mobile games that are being published lately to the play store and the app store.

What's it all about

In this short game of 12 levels, you are controlling the dark blue squares on their way to total supremacy (Total supremacy being the gameboard here).

Drawing inspiration from state.io, I made this game which is sort more high paced, with a more advanced AI, and with (in my opinion) really pretty and different graphics.

How to play
  • There's a tutorial in the first level
  • Like seriously, there's a tutorial
  • Okay
  • Basically you hold your mouse button over the squares from which you want to dispatch your soldiers, and release it on an enemy square, which has less soldiers than the sum of the soldiers in your nodes.
